nodes.bodyText: i am not getting why this needs to be synchronized
Agreed... Looks unnecessary.  What are we missing, @lennyphan ?

'synchronized' unnecessary.  My mistake from cut-paste and just overlooked it by accident.
Thanks.
space after comma - weird that checkstyle did not get that
